p.k: This episode of 'BIRD.tv' features the Snarky Puppys pianist: Bill Laurence! (2014)
p.d: Rotterdam's ' BIRD' is a club, caf√© and restaurant with a live music programme that's deeply rooted in jazz, and also branches out towards soul, funk, hip-hop and electronic music as well. Its name 'BIRD' refers to the nickname of the legendary New York jazz saxophonist, bebop co-founder Charlie Parker (1920-1955). BIRD serves Neapolitan pizzas, good wines, no-nonsense beers and an all-round metropolitan rawness. Since 2014, this urban jazz club and DJAZZ.tv have been collaborating for a series of music programmes: 'BIRD.tv', allowing you to experience the best BIRD concerts and interviews as from a first row seat! In today's episode, our guest is Snarky Puppys pianist: Bill Laurence!
